Sentencas: Proton conducting ceramics exhibit high levels of bulk proton conductivity at intermediate temperatures (500-700 degrees C).
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: However, this material class has not been widely utilized in energy conversion and storage applications due to the blocking behavior of the grain boundary proton conduction.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: A better understanding of proton conduction in these materials requires a systematic study of the sintering conditions that determine microstructure and ultimately the electrical properties.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: In this work, spark plasma sintering with high heating rates was employed to prepare a state-of-the-art BaZr0.9Y0.1O3-delta (BZY) proton conductor for studies focused on the behavior of proton conduction at the grain boundary interfaces.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: The ceramics prepared by the SPS method resulted in an ultra-fine grain size of approximately 200 nm.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: The large grain boundary interfacial area was used as a tool to investigate the interfacial conduction in these materials systems.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: Samples displayed a lowered grain boundary conductivity and a higher activation energy compared with the literature results on conventionally prepared materials.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: The lower bulk conductivity is interpreted with reference to polymorphs of BZY sintered at different temperatures.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications

Sentencas: The combined effect led to a lower total conductivity of the SPS densified BZY ceramics.
Titulo: Spark-plasma-sintered barium zirconate based proton conductors for solid oxide fuel cell and hydrogen separation applications
